Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hello, is there any way to decrease review times for ads? im really eager to start promoting on your platform. Thanks

Hi Jones, the ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. Sometimes it can be even quicker thanks to our awesome Ad Ops team! Unfortunately, there's no way to expedite this process further. You can find more details here: [How to create your first ad](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17618196971149-How-to-create-your-first-ad). If you have any other questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!
okay thanks, and every ad gets manually reviewed even after my first one being approved?

Yes, Jones, every ad goes through a review process to ensure it complies with our guidelines and policies. This helps maintain a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
You're welcome, Jones! If you have any more questions or need further assistance in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Happy promoting!
im still waiting for my camp to be approved

I understand your eagerness to get started, Jones. If your ad is pending due to it being a new account and not being verified, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.
